user_query: I'm planning a girls' night out and I need some unique cocktail recipes. Can you suggest some cocktails that are perfect for a fun and memorable evening? Also, find the details of a specific cocktail with the ID '45'. Additionally, recommend some empowering and energetic songs to keep the party going. Finally, provide me with the nearest places to buy the ingredients for the cocktails and some party supplies.

TaskList.description: Retrieve unique cocktail recipes suitable for a fun evening.
Fetch the details of the cocktail with ID '45'.
Compile a list of empowering and energetic songs for the party.
Find the nearest places to buy cocktail ingredients and party supplies.
